front.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of High-Temperature Insulation Materials in Liquid-Immersed Power Transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Technical information is provided related to liquid-immersed power transformers insulated with high-temperature materials.Guidelines for applying existing qualified high- temperature materials to certain insulation systems,recommendations for loading high- temperature liquid-immersed power transformers,and technical information on insulation-system temperature ratings and test procedures for qualifying new high-temperature materials are included.
